00042 void LocationCache::insert(uint32_t tableId, RangeLocationInfo &range_loc_info, bool pegged) {
00043   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00044   ValueT *newValue = new ValueT;
00045   LocationMapT::iterator iter;
00046   LocationCacheKeyT key;
00047 
00048   //cout << tableId << " start=" << start_row << " end=" << end_row << " location=" << location << endl << flush;
00049 
00050   newValue->start_row = range_loc_info.start_row;
00051   newValue->end_row   = range_loc_info.end_row;
00052   newValue->location  = get_constant_location_str(range_loc_info.location.c_str());
00053   newValue->pegged    = pegged;
00054 
00055   key.tableId = tableId;
00056   key.end_row = (range_loc_info.end_row == "") ? 0 : newValue->end_row.c_str();
00057 
00058   // remove old entry
00059   if ((iter = m_location_map.find(key)) != m_location_map.end())
00060     remove((*iter).second);
00061 
00062   // make room for the new entry
00063   while (m_location_map.size() >= m_max_entries) {
00064     if (m_tail->pegged)
00065       move_to_head(m_tail);
00066     else
00067       remove(m_tail);
00068   }
00069 
00070   // add to head
00071   if (m_head == 0) {
00072     assert(m_tail == 0);
00073     newValue->next = newValue->prev = 0;
00074     m_head = m_tail = newValue;
00075   }
00076   else {
00077     m_head->next = newValue;
00078     newValue->prev = m_head;
00079     newValue->next = 0;
00080     m_head = newValue;
00081   }
00082 
00083   // Insert the new entry into the map, recording an iterator to the entry in the map
00084   {
00085     std::pair<LocationMapT::iterator, bool> old_entry;
00086     LocationMapT::value_type map_value(key, newValue);
00087     old_entry = m_location_map.insert(map_value);
00088     assert(old_entry.second);
00089     newValue->mapIter = old_entry.first;
00090   }
00091 
00092 }

00097 LocationCache::~LocationCache() {
00098   for (std::set<const char *, lt_cstr>::iterator iter = m_location_strings.begin(); iter != m_location_strings.end(); iter++)
00099     delete [] *iter;
00100   for (LocationMapT::iterator lmIter = m_location_map.begin(); lmIter != m_location_map.end(); lmIter++)
00101     delete (*lmIter).second;
00102 }

00108 bool LocationCache::lookup(uint32_t tableId, const char *rowKey, RangeLocationInfo *range_loc_info_p, bool inclusive) {
00109   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00110   LocationMapT::iterator iter;
00111   LocationCacheKeyT key;
00112 
00113   //cout << tableId << " row=" << rowKey << endl << flush;
00114 
00115   key.tableId = tableId;
00116   key.end_row = rowKey;
00117 
00118   if ((iter = m_location_map.lower_bound(key)) == m_location_map.end())
00119     return false;
00120 
00121   if ((*iter).first.tableId != tableId)
00122     return false;
00123 
00124   if (inclusive) {
00125     if (strcmp(rowKey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) < 0)
00126       return false;
00127   }
00128   else {
00129     if (strcmp(rowKey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) <= 0)
00130       return false;
00131   }
00132 
00133   move_to_head((*iter).second);
00134 
00135   range_loc_info_p->start_row = (*iter).second->start_row;
00136   range_loc_info_p->end_row   = (*iter).second->end_row;
00137   range_loc_info_p->location  = (*iter).second->location;
00138 
00139   return true;
00140 }

00142 bool LocationCache::invalidate(uint32_t tableId, const char *rowKey) {
00143   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00144   LocationMapT::iterator iter;
00145   LocationCacheKeyT key;
00146 
00147   //cout << tableId << " row=" << rowKey << endl << flush;
00148 
00149   key.tableId = tableId;
00150   key.end_row = rowKey;
00151 
00152   if ((iter = m_location_map.lower_bound(key)) == m_location_map.end())
00153     return false;
00154 
00155   if ((*iter).first.tableId != tableId)
00156     return false;
00157 
00158   if (strcmp(rowKey, (*iter).second->start_row.c_str()) < 0)
00159     return false;
00160 
00161   remove((*iter).second);
00162   return true;
00163 }

00166 void LocationCache::display(std::ofstream &outfile) {
00167   for (ValueT *value = m_head; value; value = value->prev)
00168     outfile << "DUMP: end=" << value->end_row << " start=" << value->start_row << endl;
00169 }

00176 void LocationCache::move_to_head(ValueT *cacheValue) {
00177 
00178   if (m_head == cacheValue)
00179     return;
00180 
00181   // unstich entry from cache
00182   cacheValue->next->prev = cacheValue->prev;
00183   if (cacheValue->prev == 0)
00184     m_tail = cacheValue->next;
00185   else
00186     cacheValue->prev->next = cacheValue->next;
00187 
00188   cacheValue->next = 0;
00189   cacheValue->prev = m_head;
00190   m_head->next = cacheValue;
00191   m_head = cacheValue;
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00198 void LocationCache::remove(ValueT *cacheValue) {
00199   assert(cacheValue);
00200   if (m_tail == cacheValue) {
00201     m_tail = cacheValue->next;
00202     if (m_tail)
00203       m_tail->prev = 0;
00204     else {
00205       assert (m_head == cacheValue);
00206       m_head = 0;
00207     }
00208   }
00209   else if (m_head == cacheValue) {
00210     m_head = m_head->prev;
00211     m_head->next = 0;
00212   }
00213   else {
00214     cacheValue->next->prev = cacheValue->prev;
00215     cacheValue->prev->next = cacheValue->next;
00216   }
00217   m_location_map.erase(cacheValue->mapIter);  
00218   delete cacheValue;
00219 }

00223 const char *LocationCache::get_constant_location_str(const char *location) {
00224   std::set<const char *, lt_cstr>::iterator iter = m_location_strings.find(location);
00225 
00226   if (iter != m_location_strings.end())
00227     return *iter;
00228 
00229   char *constantId = new char [ strlen(location) + 1 ];
00230   strcpy(constantId, location);
00231   m_location_strings.insert(constantId);
00232   return constantId;
00233 }

00239 bool LocationCache::location_to_addr(const char *location, struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00240   const char *ptr = location + strlen(location);
00241   std::string host;
00242   uint16_t port;
00243 
00244   for (--ptr; ptr >= location; --ptr) {
00245     if (*ptr == '_')
00246       break;
00247   }
00248 
00249   port = (uint16_t)strtol(ptr+1, 0, 10);
00250 
00251   host = std::string(location, ptr-location);
00252 
00253   return InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host.c_str(), port);
00254 }
